page.title: Car selector
page.para: This example illustrates how you can programmatically update the content of a selection list. See the code in the "CarSelectorHandler" class to see how this is done.

After selecting a make, press the "Update models" button to see the corresponding models. It would be nice to do this with an automatic submit when the make list changes, but no effort has been done yet in Woody to standarize Javascript-integration, so I've left that out for now.
